result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Quantrell Darnell Bounds

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Quantrell Darnell Bounds not in court, in custody.  Attorney Mark A. Schoenfeldt in court for Quantrell Darnell Bounds.  Attorney Alexander James Geocaris in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for status conference.  Defense is requesting adjourned status date to determine case posture.  Court authorized defense counsel to appear by zoom on the next scheduled court date. Case adjourned to Branch 11.
Status conference scheduled for December 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Quantrell Darnell Bounds appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Mark A. Schoenfeldt appeared by video for Quantrell Darnell Bounds.  Prosecuting Attorney Thomas Hasle in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 11, Judge Swanson. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 11.
Scheduling conference scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Quantrell Darnell Bounds appeared by video, in custody in MSDF.  Attorney Mark A. Schoenfeldt not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Arthur Kenneth Thexton in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case is set for a Preliminary Hearing. State's Witness was present. Defense Counsel did not appear and has not contacted the court. Case is adjourned. Court orders case adjourned for CAUSE for a Status Conference.
Status conference scheduled for October 4, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Quantrell Darnell Bounds not in court, defendant in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness was present. Mr Bounds was present by video from MSDF prior to the case being called on the record. Attorney Schoenfeldt failed to appear. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Quantrell Darnell Bounds in court with attorney Mark A. Schoenfeldt.  Defendant Quantrell Darnell Bounds in custody.  Michael J. Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Quantrell Darnell Bounds appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Swanson, Branch 11.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Notice of Retainer.  Received and Filed.  nk

Amount: $20.00

Defendant Quantrell Darnell Bounds not in court.  Alicia H Kort appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Initial appearance scheduled for this date 6/30/2022. Defendant is in custody at MSDF. Needs to be produced for court.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 6-30-2022 @2:30p
